${modID}:VolcanicResearchPower.NAME: Volcanic Research
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a #yStatus, gain #b%d Strength.

${modID}:ChaoticResearchPower.NAME: Volcanic Research
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, add #b%d #yMagma #yBurn%s into your draw pile. NL Whenever you draw a #yStatus, gain #b%d Strength and draw #b%d card%s.

${modID}:ExtensiveTestingPower.NAME: Extensive Testing
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, play #b%d #yField #yTest%s%s.

${modID}:EclipsedFormPower.NAME: Eclipsed Form
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, draw #b%d card%s and increase your maximum hand size by #b%d. NL (Your current maximum hand size is #b%d.)

${modID}:SystemErrorPower.NAME: System Error
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, play #b%d #yShort #yCircuit%s+. NL Whenever a #yShort #yCircuit [researchersmod:DB]Completes[], apply #b%d #yDistortion to ALL enemies.

${modID}:ManipulationPower.NAME: Manipulation
DESCRIPTIONS: Increase attack damage and #yBlock gained from #yPhased cards by #b%d.

${modID}:LoseManipulationPower.NAME: Manipulation Down
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of this turn, lose #b%d #yManipulation.

${modID}:TeslaCoilPower.NAME: Tesla Coil
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, add #b%d #yPlasmic #yEnerg%s+ into your draw pile.

${modID}:HadalJetsuitPower.NAME: Hadal Jetsuit
DESCRIPTIONS: When you #yExhaust a card, ALL enemies lose #b%d HP for each #yDistortion they have.

${modID}:O5CommandPower.NAME: O5 Command
DESCRIPTIONS: You cannot draw cards for the next #b%d turn%s.

${modID}:AccelechargerPower.NAME: Accelecharger
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, choose #b%d card%s in your draw pile to add to your hand. NL It gains #yEthereal.
Choose %d card%s in your draw pile to add to your hand with Ethereal.

${modID}:OrbitalStrikePower.NAME: Orbital Strike
DESCRIPTIONS: Deal #b%d damage to ALL enemies when all #yOrbital #yBeacons are played.

${modID}:OwnTempoPower.NAME: Own Tempo
DESCRIPTIONS: Your next #b%d [researchersmod:DB]Experiment%s[] played twice.

${modID}:PhaseNextCardPower.NAME: Phase Next Card
DESCRIPTIONS: #yPhase a copy of the next #b%d card%s you play.

${modID}:BorealisProtocolPower.NAME: Borealis Protocol
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, #yPhase all non-Power cards with #yPhase #b%d time%s.

${modID}:IonSurgePower.NAME: Ion Surge
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you [researchersmod:DB]Progress an [researchersmod:DB]Experiment[] each turn, apply #b%d #yDistortion to ALL enemies.

${modID}:BlackBoxPower.NAME: Black Box
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yExhaust a card, gain #b%s #yMetallicize, then lose that much in #b2 turns.

${modID}:InstabilityPower.NAME: Instability
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, draw #b%d less card%s. If you end a turn without playing a card, remove all #yInstability.

${modID}:PurgeRecordsPower.NAME: Purge Records
DESCRIPTIONS: When you play a #yBurnt #yDocument this turn, gain #b%d Strength.

${modID}:DamageExpAttachment.NAME: FollowUpShot
DESCRIPTIONS: An enemy takes %d damage
%d times

${modID}:DistortionPower.NAME: Distortion
DESCRIPTIONS: When attacked, take #b%d0%% of that damage again.
Receive #b%d0%% more damage from #yAttacks.

${modID}:LetVandDocumentingPower.NAME: Let Vand Documenting
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a #yStatus, draw #b%d card%s. At the start of your turn, add #b%d #yBurnt #yDocument%s to your hand.

${modID}:LoseMetallicizePower.NAME: Lose Metallicize
DESCRIPTIONS: In the end of #b%d turn%s, lose #b%d #yMetallicize.
